General.Name: Fimperkasa Utama Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Fimperkasa Utama Tbk engages in the construction service business in Indonesia. It provides housing and home office construction projects; warehouse construction; cut and fill construction roads; and parking land and toll road projects. The company also operates as a build research facility automotive manufacturer. PT Fimperkasa Utama Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Graha FIM Lt. 5, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia
